external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence. (2024, October 31). Chinese threat actor Storm-0940 uses credentials from password spray attacks from a covert network. Retrieved June 4, 2025.

objects.description: [Quad7 Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0055) has used the same User Agents of Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like Gecko and Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/80.0.3987.149 Safari/537.36 combined with a reference to the Microsoft Azure PowerShell Application ID 1950a258-227b-4e31-a9cf-717495945fc2 in their sign-in attempts.(Citation: Microsoft Storm-0940)
